app.title: Flux AI: Photo Creator
app.description:
Unleash the power of advanced AI technology to create stunning, ultra-realistic photos of yourself with Flux AI: Photo Generator. Transform your everyday selfies and photos into breathtaking, professional-quality images with just a tap.

Flux AI is designed to take your photography experience to the next level, enabling you to generate lifelike photos that capture every detail with astonishing clarity. Whether you're looking to enhance your social media presence or create high-quality portraits, Flux AI delivers flawless results every time.

You can instantly try the latest viral AI models — including Ghibli-style, cartoon, Simpson-style, Valentine's Day themes, special event headshots, and more. From seasonal trends to timeless pop culture, it's all possible!

--- What You Can Do with Flux AI ---
Generate Ultra-Realistic Photos: Create photos of yourself that are so lifelike, they’ll leave everyone in awe. Flux AI brings out the finest details, making your images truly stand out.
Transform Everyday Selfies: Turn casual snapshots into professional-looking portraits with enhanced facial features, vibrant colors, and incredible sharpness.
Enhance with AI Precision: Our state-of-the-art AI algorithms work tirelessly to give you the best possible results, refining every pixel for a photo that’s true to life.
Create Social Media-Ready Images: Generate high-quality images perfect for sharing on Instagram, Facebook, and other social platforms, ensuring you always look your best.
Flux AI is continuously updated to bring you the latest features and improvements, ensuring your experience is always top-notch. Stay tuned for exciting new capabilities that will further elevate your photo generation experience.

--- Subscription Details ---
Unlock the full potential of Flux AI with our premium subscription:

Subscription Lengths: Choose between weekly and yearly plans.
Easy Management: Your payment will be charged to your Google Account upon confirmation. Manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal settings directly from your Account Settings.
Auto-Renewal: Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Cancellation Policy: Cancel anytime, and your subscription remains active until the end of the current period. Please note that the current subscription period will not be refunded.
Free Trial: If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription.
We value your feedback! If you have any feature requests or suggestions, please feel free to reach out to us at app@univerlist.com

Terms of Service: https://univenn.com/app/agreement/policy
Privacy Policy: https://univenn.com/app/agreement/terms

reviews.text: The app does not have a free option it makes you pay to use it. You also can not change which selfies you upload. Once you've uploaded photos, you can not delete or replace them. Outside of the lack of ability to delete or replace the photos and lack of free options, the app does as intended but is very, disappointingly limited. I would not have paid for this had I know it was so limited. It is not worth paying for.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback. We are aware that the ability to delete or replace uploaded images is important, and we are actively working to add these features soon. Stay tuned for upcoming updates!

reviews.text: Cannot try app without buying subscription... I will NEVER purchase ANY app without testing it first! The legit apps let you test them first... And the best of the best even let you use their app without purchasing at all, they just add their watermark to the final image... They know that watermark will bring in more users because they know they produce quality images. You gotta show people your app is worth subscribing to... Right now I can't say whether it is or isn't since I couldn't try it.
reviews.replyText: We’re sorry to hear about your experience. Our app's advanced features require significant resources, which is why we can't provide free trials or credits at the moment and the app is currently available through in-app purchases, as stated in the app description. We're continuously working to improve the app's stability and accessibility.

reviews.text: Make sure you read their privacy policy before uploading your photos. Also this is actually a paid app. You can't do anything on free version. The app should be more clear on this. Edit: I am not against paid services but it should be mentioned beforehand.
reviews.replyText: Our app is free to download and offers in-app purchases for premium features. Due to the resource-intensive nature of video generation, we’re unable to provide free trials/credits at this time. However, we are committed to offering high-quality tools while working on making our services more accessible in the future. Thank you for understanding!

reviews.text: Is it possible to use other people's face instead of just your own? Worked great with my face but I tried using my wife's face and I could not find a way to upload any pictures of her. She was really looking forward to it.
reviews.replyText: Unfortunately, we do not support the use of different photo packs once you have already generated one. However, we are actively working on enabling the upload of different photo packs, so please stay tuned for updates!

reviews.text: Asks for a review before even using it. Immediate 1 star review, in my opinion. The following screen is payment request, THE PRICES DON'T MAKE IT WORTH PAYING FOR. And having a credit system by far one of the worst structures that can be used. Anyone with the correct resources can build a version completely free of charge. This app alone was built from free Open Source software. So, if you think paying for this is worth paying for, you're playing into their arms and deserve to lose the money
reviews.replyText: We can't provide free trials due to the resource-intensive nature of our technology, but we appreciate your feedback. We understand your frustration with the rating request during setup. Our aim is to gather early impressions, but we value your honest review and are always working to improve. Thanks for sharing your experience!

reviews.text: really crazy experience and 100% worth trying. if you need a headshot for a teams or some profile and don't want a professional photographer. it's a good alternative
reviews.replyText: We're delighted to hear you're finding the app useful! Your feedback motivates us to keep improving and delivering a great user experience.

reviews.text: it is the app to transfome any image into new images like ghibli , funny etc
reviews.replyText: Fantastic! We’re delighted that you’re having a great time using the app, thank you for the support!

reviews.text: Don't know what this nonsense is but its definitely not access to the Flux api. Just use the fluxpro website instead where you can actually make what you want.
reviews.replyText: We understand your concerns and would love to assist you further. If there's something specific you’d like to share, please let us know. You can reach us at https://univenn.zendesk.com/hc/en-us, and we’ll be happy to help!

reviews.text: While the image generation is pretty good. I was dissatisfied with how little there was to offer. Even with a subscription, I was only able to generate less than 30 images. the only images I could generate were using my likness in a little over twenty pre-set templates. I had no ability to add more templates or generate images based on prompts, which was this apps biggest fault. Who makes an image generator and does not have free-form image creation?

I even paid for a subscription, and after i selected the pictures, i wanted to modify , guess what, you need to buy some more credit as is not enough credit to generate a picture , this is after I already paid for subscription, what a joke, and i wanted to subscribe for all the year... i wish i could claim my money back.

app.recentChanges: We have resolved some issues with the app and improved the overall image ai quality with state-of-art models.
app.AIReview:
Flux AI: Photo Creator – A Deep Dive Review

Overview

Flux AI: Photo Creator is an ambitious entry into the increasingly crowded field of AI-powered photo generation and enhancement apps. Promising “stunning, ultra-realistic photos” with just a tap, it leverages artificial intelligence to transform user-submitted images—primarily selfies and existing photographs—into what the app describes as “breathtaking, professional-quality images.” With over 167,000 installs and a robust 4.592/5 rating (based on 10,209 user reviews), Flux AI has clearly found an audience interested in simplifying their photo editing process. The app’s core functionality centers around generating new images that mimic a professional photoshoot – offering options to add lighting effects, change backgrounds, and even apply stylistic filters all through automated AI processes. It's positioned as a tool for elevating social media content or creating high-quality portraits without requiring extensive photography skills or time investment.

Key Features

Flux AI boasts a range of features designed to streamline the photo creation workflow:

  • AI Photo Generation: The app’s central feature is its ability to generate entirely new images based on a single selfie. Users are prompted to take a picture, and the AI then creates variations with different lighting, poses, and backgrounds.
  • Ghiblify Mode: This unique mode attempts to recreate the aesthetic of Studio Ghibli animated films, applying characteristic soft lighting, pastel colors, and dreamy effects to photos. This is a significant differentiator for the app.
  • Background Replacement: Users can replace their existing photo’s background with a selection of pre-loaded backgrounds or upload their own images for seamless integration.
  • Lighting Effects: The app provides several lighting presets – “Golden Hour,” "Studio Lighting," "Dramatic" - which automatically adjust the image's colors and shadows to mimic professional studio setups.
  • Style Filters: Beyond the Ghiblify mode, Flux AI offers a selection of style filters that can be applied instantly, including options like “Vintage,” “Noir,” and “Watercolor.”
  • Pose Correction & Enhancement: A subtle feature aiming to refine facial angles and improve overall pose within generated images.

Strengths

Flux AI’s primary strength lies in its ease of use. The entire process – taking a photo, selecting a mode, and generating a new image – is remarkably intuitive and requires minimal technical knowledge. The app's interface is clean, uncluttered, and navigable with a single thumb, making it accessible to users of all experience levels.

The Ghiblify Mode is particularly noteworthy. It successfully captures the dreamy, romantic aesthetic associated with Ghibli films, producing images that are genuinely appealing and visually striking. This feature alone has driven a significant portion of the app’s popularity. The varying lighting effects also provide impressive results quickly, allowing users to experiment with different moods and styles without needing advanced editing skills. The high install count (167,368) indicates substantial user satisfaction – suggesting that the core functionality delivers on its promises at least for a large segment of the target audience.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Flux AI has several areas where it could be improved:

  • AI Consistency: The quality of generated images can vary significantly. While some outputs are genuinely impressive, others appear artificial or overly smoothed, particularly when attempting complex lighting effects. User reviews frequently mention inconsistent results requiring multiple attempts to achieve a desired outcome.
  • Background Replacement Limitations: The background replacement tool is somewhat limited in its ability to seamlessly blend backgrounds with the subject. Hard edges and unnatural transitions are common, especially with more intricate backgrounds.
  • Limited Control: Users have very little direct control over the AI’s parameters. There aren't options to fine-tune aspects like depth of field or specific color adjustments within each mode. The app operates primarily on pre-set algorithms.
  • Processing Time: Generating images can sometimes be slow, particularly when utilizing more complex modes like Ghiblify. A faster processing engine would significantly improve the user experience.

User Experience

The overall user experience is generally positive, primarily due to the app’s intuitive interface and straightforward workflow. The onboarding process is simple and quick, guiding users through the basic functionalities without overwhelming them with options. However, as previously noted, the inconsistency in AI output can lead to a frustrating experience for some users who spend considerable time tweaking settings and generating multiple variations before achieving acceptable results. The app’s reliance on internet connectivity is also a factor; offline image generation isn't supported.

Value for Money

Flux AI is offered entirely free of charge, which represents significant value for users interested in experimenting with AI-powered photo creation. The absence of ads or in-app purchases further enhances its accessibility. However, the reliance on AI processing might eventually lead to increased data usage, and the quality of output isn't always consistently high enough to justify a paid upgrade (if one were offered).

Conclusion

Flux AI: Photo Creator is a promising app that successfully demonstrates the potential of AI in simplifying photo editing. Its ease of use, particularly the Ghiblify mode, are significant strengths that have driven its popularity. However, inconsistent AI output and limited control over parameters prevent it from achieving truly exceptional quality across all generated images. For casual users seeking quick and easy ways to enhance their selfies or create stylized photos, Flux AI is a worthwhile download. However, those expecting consistently professional-grade results may find themselves slightly disappointed. The app’s continued success will depend on improvements in its AI algorithms and the ability to deliver more predictable and high-quality outputs – perhaps with future updates introducing greater user control over the creative process.
